ja352:3.3: tatheva tiṭṭhanti → so tāta tatheva tiṭṭhati (mr)
ja352:4.1: sīsañca → sīsaṃ vā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja352:6.1: Abbahī → abbūḷhaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); abbahi (pts-vp-pli1); abbhūḷhaṃ (mr)
ja352:6.2: yamāsi hadayassitaṃ → sokaṃ hadayanissitaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); yamāsi hadayanissitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
